title: 2026 Winter Olympics - Wikipedia
snippet: The 2026 Winter Olympics (Italian: Olimpiadi invernali del 2026), officially the XXV Winter Olympic Games and commonly known as Milano Cortina 2026, is an upcoming international multi-sport event scheduled to take place from 6 to 22 February 2026 at sites across Lombardy and Northeast Italy.

title: 2026 Winter Olympics: What you need to know - dw.com
snippet: This Friday, the 25th Winter Olympics will open in Milan and Cortina d'Ampezzo. How big will the Games be? Will Russia be allowed to participate in the competitions — and what about security and ...

title: Winter Olympics 2026 Schedule, & Timings for Each Event
snippet: The Winter Olympics 2026 in Milano–Cortina bring together snow and ice sports across northern Italy, packed into a tight February schedule. Over a little more than two weeks, fans get 116 medal events, daily competitions, and ceremonies in some of the most iconic stadiums and mountain venues in Europe.
